resources.string: No music found. Supports locally stored music and Spotify Premium.
Your control link is active now. Feel free to start chatting.\n\nChatting here is anonymous. Your personal information (like username and profile picture) will not show to the other user.
Long-Distance Sex allows you to control toys with the movement of Max/Nora. One of you must connect Max/Nora to use this feature.

App data is used to help us improve the way our products work. This data is in anonymous form and is not connected with individual app users. You can learn more in our privacy policy and choose whether data from your app is collected for these purposes below.

Create one or multiple alarms for your toy. When the alarm goes off, your toy will vibrate according to the selected pattern and duration that you choose. Patterns sent by users that you have saved will also appear here.
Alarms & reminders permission must be enabled to make alarms work.
You have received an alarm from %1$s, but you set the alarm to not play automatically and you can not play the alarm. You can turn on the auto-play alarm function for %2$s in the setting page

I am your Pattern assistant powered by ChatGPT. Please let me know what type of patterns you would like me to provide, such as gentle, intensive, etc.
I\\\'m sorry, I cannot generate patterns for unsuitable prompts.\\nPlease tell me what type of patterns you would like, such as gentle, intensive, and etc.

I\\\'m sorry, I cannot generate stories for unsuitable prompts. Please tell me what kind of stories you would like. For instance, what the protagonist\\\'s characteristics are, where the story set is, and what the plot is.\\n
Here is the generated pattern. Enjoy.

I am your Story assistant powered by ChatGPT. Please tell me what kind of stories you would like. \\nFor instance, what the protagonist\\\'s characteristics are, where the story set is, and what the plot is.\\nPlease provide me with details so that I can assist you in creating a compelling story.
Here is the generated story. Enjoy.

A bug has caused the app to crash. This error was auto-logged and sent to our developers so they can find and fix the bug. If this continues, please contact our support at www.lovense.com/contact so we can get more info and get it resolved faster.

App Gallery can host full Web Apps built with JavaScript. This allows for infinitely flexible interfaces that can seamlessly integrate with Lovense toys.
Want to develop for the App Gallery?
We invite you to showcase your talents and contribute to our growing collection of captivating apps and games.
Tap the button below to apply as a developer and receive the go-live notification.

The phone is low on battery. To make sure the upgrade is successful, please charge the phone to at least 40% battery.
The phone and toy are both on low battery. To make sure the upgrade is successful, please charge your toy to 50% and your phone to 40%.
The toy is low on battery. To make sure the upgrade is successful, please charge the toy to at least 50% battery.

The light will quick-flash during the upgrade. Please do not leave the current screen and do not run the app in the background.
Please power on your toy to use the new firmware.
Please reboot both your toy and phone and try again.
Your toy has disconnected. Please reboot your toy and keep it close to your phone during the upgrade to ensure a stable connection.

Loading Error: please close and reopen the Web App
Game Mode enables your Lovense toy(s) to accept control from third-party applications (like games) that are on the same network.
Connection methods vary across games. Please check each game\'s introduction page. Here are some common steps.
Step 1: Connect your toys to the Lovense Remote app and ensure that both the app and the game are connected to the same network.
Step 2: Locate the Lovense integration page within the game.
Step 3: Enter the IP and Port on your Lovense Remote app, and then tap on Connect.
How to Integrate with Lovense Remote?
The current control session ends when Game Mode is enabled
Game Mode enables your Lovense toy(s) to accept control from third-party apps (like games), or control them with Max 2 and Nora.
*Make sure your Lovense Remote and third-party applications in same network
*Make sure your Lovense Remote and third-party applications in same network

Due to your location permissions, your toys will be unable to reconnect when the app is running in the background. Please tap settings to change permissions.
Android 6.0 and above requires access to location permissions to connect Bluetooth devices. In order to connect your toys, please grant the app location permissions.
2. You have changed the security PIN.
If the PIN is invalid or forgotten, you may try the following solution.
1. Hold the toy\'s power button for 10s to disable security PIN connection. After 10s, the toy\'s light will quickly flash 3 times and the toy will power off.
2. Go to the your system’s Bluetooth manager, find your toy and forget/unpair it.
3. Reconnect the toy using this app. The security PIN will no longer be required.
Please make sure your toy is connected when you set the security PIN.
The security PIN is enabled for this toy. Connection may require you to enter the PIN in the next window. Please power on the toy before connecting.
Your security PIN may be required to connect to this toy. Enter it in the next window if necessary.
You have disabled connecting this toy using a security PIN. Please follow the instructions below to unpair the device before attempting to reconnect.
You have changed/disabled the security PIN. Please follow the instructions below to unpair the device before attempting to reconnect.
You have disabled connecting this toy using a security PIN. \nPlease power the toy back on for the new setting to take effect.

Once enabled, all Lovense apps will require the security PIN in order to connect to this toy. This may complicate your user experience. \n\nIf you forget the security PIN for this toy, hold the toy\'s power button down for 10s to disable and erase the security PIN.

Enabling a security PIN is not required and is mostly targeted for more secure public play. \n\nThe security PIN is a secure way to connect your toy. Once enabled, malicious parties within physical Bluetooth range will be unable to hijack the toy\'s connection. If you set a security PIN, you must remember it in order to connect the toy to our apps.

Security PIN has been set to %1$s . The PIN will be required when connected to an app for the first time.

Introducing the captivating and thrilling game, Projekt Melody! Control Melody to cross the neon city of Virtual Little Tokyo, leap for bytes to increase your score in 10 challenging levels. Lovense toys are integrated to enhance your experience, vibrating in response to Melody\'s movements and item collections to intensify them. Get ready for an immersive gaming experience!
